title: Example usage with Knowledge
content:
knowledge = Knowledge(
    vector_db=PgVector(
        db_url="postgresql+psycopg://ai:ai@localhost:5532/ai",
        table_name="jina_embeddings",
        embedder=JinaEmbedder(
            late_chunking=True,  # Better handling of long documents
            timeout=30.0,  # Configure request timeout
        ),
    ),
    max_results=2,
)

bash  theme={null}
    export JINA_API_KEY=xxx
    bash  theme={null}
    pip install -U sqlalchemy psycopg pgvector aiohttp requests agno
    bash  theme={null}
    docker run -d \
      -e POSTGRES_DB=ai \
      -e POSTGRES_USER=ai \
      -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=ai \
      -e PGDATA=/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata \
      -v pgvolume:/var/lib/postgresql/data \
      -p 5532:5432 \
      --name pgvector \
      agnohq/pgvector:16
    bash Mac theme={null}
      python cookbook/knowledge/embedders/jina_embedder.py
      bash Windows theme={null}
      python cookbook/knowledge/embedders/jina_embedder.py 
      ```
    </CodeGroup>
  </Step>
</Steps>
